Lexington Vocational Expert Services

CRC-certified vocational expert providing comprehensive earning capacity analysis, employability assessments, and vocational rehabilitation planning for attorneys throughout Lexington and Kentucky.

Serving Lexington & Surrounding Areas CRC Certified Court-Qualified Expert
  1. Home

  3. Lexington, KY - Vocational Expert

Expert Vocational Assessment Services for Lexington Attorneys

When your Lexington case requires precise earning capacity analysis or employability assessment, Skerritt Economics delivers CRC-certified vocational expertise that stands up to scrutiny. Our comprehensive evaluations provide the vocational foundation needed for accurate damage calculations in personal injury, disability, and employment litigation.

Our comprehensive vocational assessments are tailored to Lexington Ky's unique economic landscape. We understand the local employment market, wage structures, and the specific vocational opportunities available to residents in this community.

Vocational Expert Services in Lexington

Earning Capacity Analysis

Comprehensive evaluation of pre-injury and post-injury earning capacity, considering education, work history, and Lexington's labor market conditions.

Employability Assessment

Detailed analysis of vocational abilities, transferable skills, and realistic employment options in the Lexington metropolitan area job market.

Vocational Rehabilitation Planning

Development of practical rehabilitation plans including training needs, job placement services, and return-to-work strategies.

Labor Market Analysis

In-depth research of Lexington area employment opportunities, wage data, and industry-specific job availability for accurate assessments.

Vocational Expertise for Lexington Legal Cases

Personal Injury & Workers' Compensation

Assess residual earning capacity following injuries, evaluate vocational rehabilitation needs, and determine realistic return-to-work timelines for injured Lexington workers.

Disability & Social Security

Provide vocational evidence for disability determinations, assess functional limitations impact on employability, and evaluate alternative occupation possibilities.

Employment Litigation

Analyze wrongful termination impacts, evaluate mitigation efforts, and assess reemployment prospects in Lexington's competitive job market.

Family Law & Divorce

Determine earning capacity for support calculations, evaluate vocational rehabilitation needs, and assess employment potential for Kentucky family court proceedings.

Lexington Labor Market Knowledge

Our vocational assessments incorporate specific knowledge of Lexington's employment landscape, including:

  • Major employers and industries in the Lexington metropolitan area
  • Local wage scales and compensation trends
  • Regional education and training resources
  • Kentucky vocational rehabilitation services and programs
  • Area-specific job availability and placement rates
